name: Flipkart-affiliate
tagline: node.js wrapper for Flipkart Affiliate APIs
body:
### Welcome to flipkart-affiliate
This is a node.js Wrapper for [Flipkart Affiliate API](https://affiliate.flipkart.com).
This helps the node.js developers to create a web or mobile application by just installing this package using npm and make a call to the desired function() .

### Reference Website
[Flipkart Affiliate API](https://affiliate.flipkart.com).
___

### Authors and Contributors
Ritish Gumber (@ritishgumber) , 2016
___
### Installation 
[npm package](https://www.npmjs.com/package/flipkart-affiliate)
___
### Support or Contact
Raise [Issues](https://github.com/ritishgumber/flipkart-affiliate/issues) here.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
